name: Villein

grantsPowers.name: Put Your Back Into It!
grantsPowers.description: Use Health to Gain Harvest Pips

grantsPowers.name: Seasoned Hand
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Greatly Decreases Harvesting Tool Decay

description: A little bit of elbow grease can go a long way when it comes to harvesting. A bit more practice and patience can make one more adept and experienced while also prolonging the life of the harvesting tools used.
lore: It is practice and wisdom that creates a knowledgeable hand.
